arts.sum: A review of our comfortable Carabao cruise

arts.ttl: Fulham ease past Bristol City into Carabao Cup third round
arts.sum: Raul Jimenez ensured Fulham avoided a Carabao Cup shock as they dispatched Championship side Bristol City 2-0.

arts.ttl: Raul Jimenez ensures Fulham avoid Carabao Cup shock against Bristol City
arts.sum: Mexico striker Jimenez pressured George Tanner into scoring an early own goal and then grabbed the second as the Cottagers cruised through.

arts.ttl: Fulham vs Bristol City – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Fulham take on Bristol City in the Second Round of the Carabao Cup on Wednesday night at Craven Cottage. The fixture pits two unbeaten sides against each other. Marco Silva’s Premier League team will be looking to kick-start a cup run, while their resilient Championship opponents will be aiming for an upset in West London. arts.ttl: Fulham vs Bristol City – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Fulham begin their Carabao Cup campaign on Wednesday night, hosting Championship side Bristol City at Craven Cottage. The match provides a perfect opportunity for Marco Silva to rotate his squad and give valuable minutes to his fringe players, while also aiming to build on an unbeaten start to the season. arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's EFL Cup clash between Fulham and Bristol City, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
